title: "The Devourer Removal didn't hurt Kindred"
body:
I want to slap everyone who says this in the back of the head. With a hammer. While holding a nail to their head. That I sneezed on.

> _**Upon buying Devourer**_
Wolf: Another friend!
Wolf: They will see two of me!

Rito have you no soul?! They only had two friends in the world: each other and Ghost Dog! And you took him from them!

replies.body: At least they have each other. The other farm junglers had literally only the wolf pup to keep them company (because we all know they weren't ganking )

I remember when there was a bug with Shaco and Devourer that would spawn another wolf every time you used your ult, so sometimes you'd see a Shaco with 10+ wolves following him. It was so fun to run around as the Clown Pound animal shelter. :P
I loved that Shaco bug. Good times.

Just a friendly FYI, that wasn't a shaco exclusive bug. It could happen to any clone champion I believe.

Did someone say leblanc jungle?
{{champion:117}} {{item:1419}} Doesn't miss anyone :^)

The removal of devourer only strengthened there bond with each other.
Edit: I refuse to correct my grammar! Yuo all will have to suffer!
you used the wrong "their"

>you used the wrong "their"

You beat me to it. :c
Yew beet me two it*
Ewe beet me two it*
Ewe beet moi two it*
Ironically, you used the wrong "to". Not sure if intentional joke or unintentional mistake.
http://cdn.iwastesomuchtime.com/872014183935.gif

> [{quoted}](name=GilgameshSol,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Qmi2QsvP,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-06-06T21:06:26.546+0000)
>
> you used the wrong "their"

There their they're honey it'll be OK.
https://themillennialfalcon.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/8941.gif
RIP Cute Ghost dog 2016
Being fair, they'd have more friends if they weren't such dicks, as Amumu can confirm.
Amumu ganks for every lane consistently and lands good ults, yet he still has no friends.
It's because he's so god damn _WHINEY_

Hey, it's not my fault I can keep my {{item:3070}} up indefinitely in the lategame/with blue buff.

Besides, Amumu's {{item:3070}} deal %HP dmg, so he's basically a tank Fizz with stuns and better teamfighting.
_**SICK OF YOUR SHIT AMUMU**_

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/59/59fcc15f5e8c890ecb43077e4300d7f57ccd2221ee7d89a652eb03fc4021f2c0.jpg

I hate playing Amumu because I hate every word he says.
To be fair anyone who touches amumu gets hit by his curse

She still has {{champion:19}} 

http://img.ifcdn.com/images/9c59f7aa4cac185c787ae04e32c4721433bc4bd8fa1f3f654a3a1e1b55ae6358_1.jpg
Do they actually say that?

Yes, she misses him...

BUT HER AIM IS GETTING BETTER!

Yes, she misses him...

BUT HER AIM IS GETTING BETTER!

And then you go kill the wolves but realize {{champion:19}}  is stealing them so you have a four man wolf party

four wolves and one lamb
5 wolves.
It would be 5 because the wolf camp has 3 wolves, ww is a wolf, and Kindred has one wolf

I want them to bring back the wolf spirit for the wolf camp smite. Change the sound of the "on my way" and "assist me" pings on it to some of the sounds the wolf would make. Then bring back Kindred's voice lines for buying devourer by changing the trigger to smiting the large murkwolf

"What do all stories have in common dear wolf?"
"They end"
They should add a ghost wolf to bloodrazor just by default
Did not see this coming +1, OP.
Buy Rageblade
They should have it so you have Ghost Dog with you when you have bloodrazor.
upvoted because...you know....reasons
the ghost dog is on rageblade now...buy that and be whole again young wolf{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
that's true....
Well it's hard to take care of two pets.
You got me. 10/10
